text:
Here is the preprint 🧐 on the 🇫🇷 #Hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) study by Dr. D. Raoult @IHU_Marseille:

➡️ 20 pt. (net) rec. 600mg HCQ daily (3x 200mg)
➡️ *some pt. got azithromycin (judgment call)
➡️ 16 pt. control group

#COVID19 #treatment 💊 #chloroquine
